# Simulated vanilla on_actions file
# Load order: 1 (first)

on_birthday = {
    trigger = {
        is_alive = yes
    }
    
    events = {
        birthday.0001
        birthday.0002
    }
    
    effect = {
        add_prestige = 10
    }
}

on_death = {
    trigger = {
        is_ruler = yes
    }
    
    events = {
        death.0001
    }
    
    on_actions = {
        on_heir_inherits
    }
    
    effect = {
        # Vanilla death cleanup
        remove_character_flag = some_flag
    }
}

on_war_started = {
    events = {
        war.0001
        war.0002
    }
}
